ygData.subject: Suggested Formats For Recursive NEAT
ygData.msgSnippet: Please find the below suggestions regarding formats for recursive NEAT: enum functype { SIGMOID = 0, EMBEDDEDGENOME = 1, EMBEDDEDPOPULATION = 2 }; Starting

Please find the below suggestions regarding formats for recursive 
NEAT:

	=
enum functype {
		SIGMOID =3D 0,
		EMBEDDEDGENOME =3D 1,
		EMBEDDEDPOPULATI=
ON =3D 2
	};

Starting Genome Format Modification For Recursive Network Def=
inition:

genomestart 1
trait 1 0.1 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 
trait 2 0.2 0 0 0 0 0 0 =
0 
trait 3 0.3 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 
node 1 0 1 3
node 2 0 1 1
node 3 0 1 1
node 4=
 0 1 1
node 5 0 0 2 1 node1network
gene 1 1 5 0 0 1 0 1
gene 2 2 5 0 0 2 0 =
1
gene 3 3 5 0 0 3 0 1
genomeend 1

For ftype not SIGMOID, add ftype & embe=
dded network filename 
(i.e. "node1network") to node input/output format.

=
Thoughtful suggestions are solicited.

Thanks,
Andy
